DataElement.preferredName: Quality of Life Questionnaire Collected Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to the collection of a predetermined sets of questions used to collect data regarding a broad ranging concept that incorporates an individual's physical health, psychological state, level of independence, social relationships, personal beliefs and their relationships to salient features of the environment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the collection of a predetermined sets of questions used to collect data regarding a broad ranging concept that incorporates an individual's physical health, psychological state, level of independence, social relationships, personal beliefs and their relationships to salient features of the environment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Property.preferredDefinition: Collected; brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: Collected; brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

DataElementConcept.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
